mapper.select: SELECT orderNo, content, score FROM Review WHERE orderNo = (SELECT orderNo FROM Orders WHERE userNo = #{userNo})
SELECT orderNo, content, score FROM Review WHERE orderNo = (SELECT orderNo FROM Orders o, Auction a WHERE o.auctionNo = a.auctionNo)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Review (orderNo, userNo, content, score) VALUES (#{orderNo}, #{userNo}, #{content}, #{score})
